mapper.select: select ( select comp_name from comp_tb where comp_id = j.comp_id) title, ( select photo from comp_tb where comp_id = j.comp_id ) photo, title, career, position, r.skill_name1, r.skill_name2, r.skill_name3, address, created_at from jobs_tb j join required_skill_tb r on j.jobs_id = r.jobs_id where career regexp #{jDto.carrer} and address regexp #{jDto.address} and SKILL_NAME1 regexp #{jDto.skill} and position regexp #{jDto.position}
